Dead by Daylight is a top secret torture method that is developed by Behaviour Interactive. This game is very bad and I don't recommend it to anyone. You have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game. Thankfully, spending about 30 minutes in DbD makes you retarded. In DbD you can visit very interesting locations like ORMOND or HADDONFIELD.. nothing else. This game will bring you very fun experiences and fond memories. You can play as the survivors who need to repair generators to escape. Playing survivor is very easy considering this game is very balanced. The only thing you need to watch out for are random survivors that have the intellect of a plants vs zombies pea shooter. You can also play the killer who kills the survivors. Don't worry, out of every killer only like 3 are viable on high ranks. And you need to apply pressure to 4 people at the same time while you're playing padded jaws trapper. Thankfully, after 6 years this game still feels like its in Alpha. Its not DbD if the map doesn't have shit hitboxes and is full with bugs. This game also consists of  very fun cosmetics like 15$ trapper skin and pure cancer. Overall this game is fun for the first 100 hours, then its just pure pain and suffering. Its also like 100$ with every DLC.
The direction they took this game after the beta is terrible. I can't suggest playing this terrible game to anyone until they fix the issues with this game. Shit.

黎明杀机是一款恐怖背景的非对称对抗竞技游戏，与传统的对称对抗竞技不同，非对称的机制使得游戏节奏更加紧密，氛围更加紧张，体验更加刺激。
人数上的不对称：游戏分为逃生者与杀手两方，逃生者有4人[strike]轻锐小队[/strike]，彼此之间可以分头行动，各司其职；也可以相互协助，共同行动，而杀手则是单枪匹马，一人成军。逃生者的目的是修理七台中的五台发电机使大门通电，然后开启大门逃出生天；而屠夫的目的是击倒并抓住所有逃生者，然后将其献祭给恶灵。
能力上的不对称：逃生者虽然人数众多，却不可以攻击杀手，相对应的可以利用场景或一些道具来对杀手进行干扰，如放下场景中的木板使杀手暂时眩晕，或使用手电筒照射杀手面部使其暂时失明等，必要时也可利用自己的身体为同伴阻挡伤害；杀手除了可以攻击逃生者以外，还各自拥有独特的特殊能力可以使用，如隐身，瞬移，远程攻击等，杀手的行走速度快于逃生者，但在翻越等动作中没有逃生者灵活。在对局中，杀手是以第一人称视角进行游戏，同时可以看到逃生者逃窜时留下的划痕，听到逃生者qie失败发出的声响和而逃生者拥有视野更宽广的第三人称视角，可以更好的搜集环境中的信息，察觉周围的变化。
逃脱，救援，牵制；找寻，击倒，献祭......游戏中双方所有的操作都需要一定时间来完成，所有人都分身乏术，这使得游戏过程中充满了残酷、两难的选择，应该先去往何处？何时利用道具或技能？何时可以快速莽撞的行动，何时又该步步为营，徐徐图之？双方各自的选择又构成了博弈，如何以己之长攻敌之短是需要一直思考的问题，整个游戏过程都能感受到和对手以及队友的互动感。

I've been playing on and off since about 2019 but I only REALLY got into it in the past few months. It's a fun game with a lot of interesting ideas. It has a lot of flaws right now though. The balancing is all over the place, cheaters are somewhat rampant, the community is really bad in parts, the current skill based matchmaking and how it's implemented is pure trash 95% of the time and the game contains many, MANY bugs. If you can put up with that and still have fun, I'd say give it a shot. If not, it might not be for you.

Game started out fine in the early years, but developers took what they had going for them & ran it into the ground. Without any real competition, they can make the game worse without any flak. Can't wait for that VHS game to come out, seems more fun from what I've seen. I will be uninstalling DBD.

It's a super fun game, but people take it waaaaaay too seriously....like on a COD or Dark Souls level of serious.

Short Version
Fun to play until you get high rank. Ranks reset once a month so dipping out and coming back in the future to avoid 24/7 sweaty and sabotaged matches is the best way to enjoy this.


Long Version
This game is a fun cat and mouse style game up until the top ranks. If you aren't playing with a pre-made party at that point the community can become toxic (other survivors dumping killer on you, giving your locations away intentionally, etc.).

You'll find the end game killers come in basically two flavors, 1) crappy game ruining ones (the vast majority) who face camp survivors and tunnel them out of matches (approved and praised by the developers as a winning method, with total disregard for how game play is for those survivors on the hook who then de-pip). 
2) High skilled ones that understand the game is meant to be fun who challenge you without resorting to bullying tactics.

 Many killers can teleport, see auras, and block their auras from being seen (nulling several survivor perks). The only fighting chance most will have at high ranks is by having that pre-made group with voice chat. Which still doesn't give much of an advantage all things considered. 

Overall, the game is fun and I've purchased it for several friends, with that said, we also stopped playing upon hitting the next to highest rank in the game, because it just stopped being fun playing with random people. 

Custom games are a fun alternative if you have the friends and don't mind making no progress in the main game, but would be better IMO if they added an alternate mode of customs to allow us to level up and play privately, leveling up our 'ranks' and just having it be it's own leveling, aka not synced with public matches. 

The game is fun and ranks reset every month, it's IMHO that playing until the end game and then dipping for a few months when it's too toxic is the best way to play this. Still fun, but it does have that 'death clock' feel to it knowing you're edging closer to endlessly sweaty and sabotaged matches.
This game is a lot of fun to play with friends is all I've gotta say about that.
O jogo é muito mal otimizado, não para de crashar, delays de render constantes, isso destroi completamente minha experiencia de gameplay, eu realmente fiquei bolado.

Share my thoughts... I'm not sure if you want me to do that. 

The game is 100% survivor leaned.. That was made clear with the release of Legion. A killer where their ability does nothing but help the survivor run away faster. "Oh but they have to mend.." Useless.. Because we have to stop chasing them for that to even start, and if we keep chasing them and hit them AGAIN with a knife it does nothing and our ability stops.

Then the PTB.. I played 2 matches of the new Haddonfield update.. and I was done. Don't get me wrong, the graphics and visuals of the new map amazing. Could even swear they added new Pallet Breaking sounds. But everything else of the map... survivor based. You play a stealth killer, where you not being seen is a REQUIREMENT to get anything done? Haddonfield is wide open. Went from a regular real life street gaping of houses to 2x if not 3x the space on the street, with nothing taller than the occasaional pallet. Lets not forget the endless loop made of cars by one of the houses. 

Then we come to this MMR changes. Yes I get it, its a test. I will in no way say I was a professional Huntress Killer, I know there are people better than me. But before these changes I got 4 kills I wanna say 70-80% of the time. 2 kills atleast 90% of the time. This MMR change... Im lucky to get 1 hook before the gates are open. 

Behaviour you want to know why the Killer side of this community is failing? Stop favoring the survivors. This  game is nothing without killers. Another reason why, Survivor toxicity is through the roof! 

I uninstalled this game for 4 reasons. 
1) I'm done with the Toxicity from survivors. Using Flashlights not as intended, teabagging and generally being disrespectful
2) Behaviours lack of Consistant Moderation. If you look in game when you go to report someone under Trolling, "Body Blocking" is clearly listed there. Plain as day. (This will tie into #3) Yet  on their forums, they say Body Blocking is not reportable.. Hmmmm
3) Immersion Breaking --> Because of this 'Body Blocking' Meta.. it destroys what little immersion I have left in the game. You are being chased by lets say an Axe Throwing Woman. Who in their right mind will willing stand between them and the person they are targeting.. Nobody.. 

Don't get me wrong I am okay with bodyblocking when the killer is carrying a survivor to a hook. 

4) Another not really enforced reportable offence that doesn't see any attention to --> Taking the game hostage. You got the Gens done. Cool. Now leave. Don't 99% every door, run around troll the killer. Teabag the killer, click at the killer and be disrespectful to the killer. 

I'll allow comments cause frankly if Behaviour doesn't care.. I don't care. Don't expect me to reply to them cause why would I if Behaviour can't enforce their own Reportable Offences.

Note: Added June 21st, 2022

Well I was stupid and thought things might have changed when the new DLC came out.. It felt like it did.. till once again the MMR kicked back in.

First 2 games. Were in my opinion a bit too easy for me. Nearly got two 4k matches. The next match was a joke. 0 Kills, maybe 2-3 hooks. Went right back to how it was previous. Because the game paired me with in my mind had to be new players and I wiped the floor with them, I must be a professional no life gamer who needs to be paired with other no life gamer survivors.

Is there no inbetween of New player - Expert Player? There is no reason I should go from EASILY hooking and killing people to barely able to hook anyone. Where is the common ground? It is like the first two games were literally bait to keep you playing. To be frank, I feel that scratching the skill based or MMR or what ever it is called system and going with random selections every time you queue would be 10 times better than what ever you call this match making system.

I go from enjoying the game wanting to play it, to wishing I had 572 hours less in the game so I can refund it before I break something. 

I mean common, you have an ingame report feature. You have a website report feature. Behaviour does nothing to hackers, unless YOU PROVIDE Proof. Which means you have A) Record every match you are in regardless of streaming or not just incase you find a hacker. B) Spend probably an hour or more editing that clip down to that specific match. C) Spend probably another hour finding and filing that report on their website. 

So it seems that Behaviour expects every single one of its 105,052 average players to have some sort of screen capturing?

Stop sitting on your derrière and do something about these hackers. Stop making your players be the moderation team. Unless you start paying us to play your game.

Como hacer Adobo de pollo filipino
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Ingredientes
3 libras de muslos y / o piernas de pollo deshuesados y sin piel
8 a 10 dientes grandes de ajo, machacados
1 cucharada de jengibre rebanado (no es necesario pelarlo)
1 a 2 chiles de ojo de Pájaro rojos o verdes enteros u otros chiles (opcional)
1 cucharadita de granos de pimienta negros enteros
3 hojas de laurel
1 taza de leche de coco lite
¼ taza de salsa de soya reducida en sodio (para hacer que no tenga gluten, use tamari)
¼ taza de vinagre blanco, vinagre de arroz sin sazón, vinagre de sidra o vinagre de caña
1 cucharada de azúcar morena oscura Jugo Sazonador
Cilantro fresco
Arroz jazmín cocido en caliente (opcional)
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Pasos
1) Rociar una sartén grande con spray antiadherente. Dorar el pollo por todos lados a fuego medio.
2) Colocar el pollo en la olla de cocción lenta en una sola capa. Agregar el ajo, el jengibre, el chile, los granos de pimienta y las hojas de laurel a la olla de cocción lenta.
3) Agregar la leche de coco, la salsa de soya, el vinagre y el azúcar en la misma sartén que se usó para el pollo. Mover y raspar cualquier pedacito marrón del fondo de la sartén; verter sobre el pollo en la olla de cocción lenta.
4) Tapar y cocinar a temperatura ALTA durante 2 a 3 horas o BAJA durante 4 a 5 horas o hasta que el pollo esté tierno.
5) Retirar el pollo con una cuchara y colócalo en un plato para servir; tapar para mantener el calor. Colar el jugo del pollo en una cacerola pequeña; desechar los sólidos.
6) Llevar a ebullición a fuego medio-alto. Hervir, moviendo ocasionalmente, durante unos 10 minutos o hasta que se reduzca a la mitad. Sazonar con un chorrito de el jugo sazonador.
7) Verter la salsa sobre el pollo. Decorar con cilantro. Servir con arroz.

trash game since the nerf

Hay un problema bastante grave, ahora mismo en el juego, el cual es muy simple, si borras a alguien de Steam, ese jugador te puede seguir saliendo en tu lista de amigos de el juego, viendo si estas conectado a Steam, o jugando a este juego (in posibilidad de arreglo).. En otras plataformas/consolas les está pasando lo mismo desde hace tiempo.

He enviado a sus paginas oficiales una queja, pues básicamente están violando la privacidad de la gente al consentir esto (y espero que algún moderador de Steam lea esto, pues puede haber un gran problema). Pues si borras a alguien y le bloqueas desde Steam, no tiene por que saber si estas o no estas, desde el juego (pues no tienes opciones de borrarlo desde dentro, solo "Bloquearle" para que no te invite a partida). Pues alomejor lo borras por que no coincidís o por alguna tontería. ¿Pero y si es algo grave? ¿Y si te amenaza, o es un acosador/a etc? Pues según esta empresa, te toca aguantarte, por que según ellos (y cito textualmente lo que me han enviado respecto a esto)  "However, we currently do not have an option to remove friends listed in your account and apologize for this inconvenience."

Hay cientos de jugadores de distintas plataformas (según parece), a los cuales les está pasando de manera aleatoria, con lo cual no consintáis esta practica y no compréis el juego hasta que solventen esto, pues a quedado claro que es una empresa a la cual no le importa vuestra privacidad/seguridad (pues cada persona es un mundo, y no siempre se borra a alguien por una nimiedad), ni enviando tiquet o yendo a quejaros en su pagina de bugs, os lo van a solucionar, pues llevo casi 2 semanas intentando que esto no pase en mi cuenta (y al parecer, otra gente mas tiempo).

P.D.: Si podéis dar un "SI" se agradecería, para que Steam (Steam no tiene la culpa, que quede claro) tome cartas en este asunto, pues nadie tiene derecho a vulnerar la privacidad de nadie (en ninguna de sus formas), consintiendo que puedan ver si estamos o no, si les borramos/bloqueamos por aquí (y encima si se queda bugueado en el juego, sin posibilidad de arreglo).

Al margen de ello, es un juego repetitivo como superviviente (vas a llevar siempre las mismas habilidades sin variar nisiquiera un pelín).

Como asesino te tocan premades que van a saber donde estas en cada momento, pues se consiente (según parece) las llamadas grupales con programas externos, vamos que son videntes en comparación contigo.

Si juegas con alguien, para pasar el rato es un "bueno, vale que remedio", pero como asesino, puede ser muy frustrante.

Solo vale la pena para estar un rato en compañía con gente, si no... no te lo compres, hay mejores juegos (y sin estos problemas tan graves como dije al principio).

プレイ時間累計300時間程度の初心者~中級者の意見です。
ゲーム内容は極めて良いと思います。策略を練るのが好きな方、ホラー映画に出てくる殺人鬼を操作してみたい方、身内で盛り上がりたい方などは特に楽しめるはずです。
始めた直後は理不尽を感じることも多いと思いますが、上達には並外れたエイム力のようなものは必要なく、経験を積んでゲームの仕様や定石をしっかりと理解すれば"誰でも"上位50%には入れます。

一方で特に気になる点が二つあります。
1つは生存者のマッチの遅さです。平日の深夜などはマッチまで10分以上かかったりします。原因はキラー不足です。
もう1つはまともな試合ができるようになるまでにかなりの時間と労力が必要になる点です。生存者はまだしも、キラーに関しては初期キャラのパークで勝つのが困難です。
